atbat.des: Josh Hamilton grounds out to first baseman Paul Konerko.
Joaquin Arias singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Juan Pierre.

pitch.cc: Mark Buehrle went back to the four-seam fastball even though Joaquin Arias hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: David Murphy singles on a line drive to center fielder Alex Rios. Joaquin Arias to 2nd.
Matt Treanor singles on a line drive to right fielder Carlos Quentin. Joaquin Arias to 3rd. David Murphy to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Mark Buehrle has thrown 100 pitches; he holds opposing hitters to a .000 average in the first 100 pitches and .000 after that.

atbat.des: Craig Gentry singles on a ground ball to center fielder Alex Rios. Joaquin Arias scores. David Murphy scores. Matt Treanor to 2nd.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Sergio Santos replaces Mark Buehrle.
With Elvis Andrus batting, wild pitch by Sergio Santos, Matt Treanor to 3rd. Craig Gentry to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Sergio Santos went back to the two-seam fastball even though Elvis Andrus hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Michael Young out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Alex Rios. Matt Treanor scores. Craig Gentry to 3rd. Elvis Andrus to 2nd.
Ian Kinsler doubles (8) on a line drive to left fielder Juan Pierre. Craig Gentry scores. Elvis Andrus scores.
Vladimir Guerrero grounds out, third baseman Omar Vizquel to first baseman Paul Konerko.

pitch.cc: Sergio Santos is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump John Hirschbeck.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Darren O'Day replaces Rich Harden.

atbat.des: Alexei Ramirez flies out to left fielder Josh Hamilton.
Omar Vizquel singles on a ground ball to right fielder David Murphy, deflected by first baseman Joaquin Arias.

pitch.cc: Darren O'Day had Omar Vizquel down 0-2 but could not put him away.

action.des: With Gordon Beckham batting, Omar Vizquel steals (1) 2nd base.

atbat.des: Gordon Beckham singles on a line drive to left fielder Josh Hamilton. Omar Vizquel scores. Gordon Beckham advances to 2nd, on fielding error by left fielder Josh Hamilton.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Chris Ray replaces Darren O'Day.

atbat.des: A. J. Pierzynski flies out to left fielder Josh Hamilton.

pitch.cc: Chris Ray went back to the slider even though A.J. Pierzynski hit for a double last time up.

atbat.des: Alex Rios singles on a ground ball to shortstop Elvis Andrus. Gordon Beckham to 3rd. Juan Pierre to 2nd.
Paul Konerko walks. Gordon Beckham scores. Juan Pierre to 3rd. Alex Rios to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Chris Ray went back to the four-seam fastball even though Paul Konerko hit for a single last time up.

atbat.des: Mark Kotsay flies out to left fielder Josh Hamilton.

pitch.cc: Chris Ray shows faith in Matt Treanor by throwing the slider in the dirt.
Chris Ray is trying to tie up Mark Kotsay with fastballs inside, where Mark Kotsay hits .000.
Chris Ray is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump John Hirschbeck.
